title: Apple and pear salad
ingredients: ['2 South African Granny Smith apples, cut into thin wedges', '2 South African Forelle pears, cut into thin wedges', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '200g mixed salad leaves', '100g baby spinach leaves', '200g feta cheese, crumbled', '60g walnut halves, toasted and coarsely chopped', '2 beetroots - scrubbed, peeled and cut into matchsticks', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons walnut oil', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon thyme, finely chopped', '1/2 garlic clove, crushed', '1 pinch caster sugar', 'salt and pepper to taste']
